channel.title: Case Study on Lukas Rieder
channel.description: Recent content in Case Study on Lukas Rieder

item.title: Cloudflare Edge Side Includes
item.description:
Learn about how my client Titel Media was able to use Cloudflare Workers to implement simple edge side includes.

The idea is to partially replace the parts of the online magazine https://www.highsnobiety.com/ with a new, and much more refined frontend implementation.

In this article, you will get to know the use case, and how I found a powerful application for Cloudflare Workers.
